name: DeleteImages
description: Delete images from the set of training images.

imageIds.description: Ids of the images to be deleted. Limited to 256 images per batch.

allImages.description: Flag to specify delete all images, specify this flag or a list of images. Using this flag will return a 202 response to indicate the images are being deleted.

allIterations.description: Removes these images from all iterations, not just the current workspace. Using this flag will return a 202 response to indicate the images are being deleted.

$ul: **message**: A message explaining the error reported by the service.
